thread.section_title: MOO.COM Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MOO.COM | www.moo.com | 5 of 147
thread.title: Ryan Brown

author: Ryan Brown
title: Ryan Brown
text:
I'd been getting business cards from Moo for years, but for the first time I ordered stickers from them.
I had received a sample pack with sticker samples in it before, but there's often a difference between seeing a sample, and seeing your actual design. The print quality and alignment on the stickers actually exceeded my expectations.
My only, very minor complaint, is that while the sticker sheets are perforated, they didn't seem to want to tear on the perforations, and if I tried to fold them to make them tear easier, the waste material between stickers folded up and came off the backing paper.
